meanings.definition: Having or showing a strong desire and determination to succeed.
meanings.sent1: She displayed great ambitiousness in pursuing her dreams.
meanings.sent2: His ambitiousness led him to take on challenging projects.
meanings.sent3: Her ambitiousness to climb the mountain was admirable.
meanings.sent4: The ambitiousness of the young entrepreneur knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The ambitiousness of the plan impressed everyone.

meanings.sent1: His ambitiousness was evident in his relentless pursuit of success.
meanings.sent2: She admired his ambitiousness and determination to achieve his goals.
meanings.sent3: The cat's ambitiousness to catch the laser pointer entertained the family.
meanings.sent4: The ambitiousness of the marathon runner inspired others to push themselves.
meanings.sent5: The ambitiousness of the student's goals set him apart from his peers.

meanings.definition: A strong desire to do or achieve something, typically requiring determination and hard work.
meanings.sent1: Her ambitiousness to excel in her career was unwavering.
meanings.sent2: The team's ambitiousness to win the championship fueled their training.
meanings.sent3: The ambitiousness of the squirrel to reach the bird feeder was amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The ambitiousness of the flower to bloom in harsh conditions was inspiring.
meanings.sent5: His ambitiousness to learn a new language impressed his classmates.
